Package socialNetworkPackage

Class DataHolder

java.lang.Object
socialNetworkPackage.DataHolder
public class DataHolder
extends java.lang.Object
This is the main class which contains the data while in runtime. The data is stored in hash maps. The only thing that is not stored here is the friends relationships. They are stored in Person class, inside one of their attributes.
Author:
Borja Moralejo Tobajas and Imanol Mara√±a Hurtado

    • DataHolder

      public DataHolder​(int hashMapsSize)
      Constructor of the class. Input the desired initial size of the hash maps.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • addPersonToNetwork

      public void addPersonToNetwork​(Person p) throws AlreadyOnTheCollectionException
      Adds person into the network data base, it takes the related data blocks and adds Person p's id into it.
      Parameters:
      p - - Person.
      Throws:
      AlreadyOnTheCollectionException - - If the person that was trying to add was already on the collection

    • removePersonFromNetwork

      public void removePersonFromNetwork​(Person p) throws ElementNotFoundException
      Removes person from the network data and if the person's data block is left empty, it removes the data block from the hash map.
      Parameters:
      p - - Person.
      Throws:
      ElementNotFoundException - - Throws this exception if the Person p isn't in the network data.

    • getPersonByID

      public Person getPersonByID​(java.lang.String id) throws ElementNotFoundException
      Gets person by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - - String.
      Returns:
      Person - Person with the given id.
      Throws:
      ElementNotFoundException - - There's no one with that ID

    • searchPeopleByAttribute

      public Person[] searchPeopleByAttribute​(int attribute, java.lang.String value) throws ElementNotFoundException
      Searches people by the given attribute. It returns the group that matches the search.
      Parameters:
      attribute - - int. Use Person class' public static final ints for this.
      value - - String search value.
      Returns:
      Person[] group of people that matches the search.
      Throws:
      ElementNotFoundException - - There's nobody with that attribute

    • loadFile

      public void loadFile​(java.lang.String fileName, int option)
      Loads file and then loads people that is stored inside.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - String.
      option - - Indicates if this method will load people or load relationships

    • loadRelationship

      public void loadRelationship​(java.lang.String data)
      Takes the input and links the nodes of the 2 given ID, separated by ","
      Parameters:
      data - 2 String separated by ","

    • printIntoFile

      public void printIntoFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Prints all people in the network into the given file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - String. Wanted file name.

      Gets all the people of the network and returns the collection
